message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what most people pay for similar services. Considering its true worth and your anticipated benefit, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with the best possible experience while ensuring you get the most value for your investment. We're confident this price reflects the immense value this product offers, and we look forward to having you as our valued customer.
